snippet.title: B-17 Squadron Trailer
snippet.description:
Add B-17 Squadron to your Steam Wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1502460/B17_Squadron/

Take control of a B-17 in a realistic bomber simulator. Destroy key targets by dropping tons of bombs on them. Command each member of the crew and feel their stress and tension. Take part in the historical campaign across occupied Europe.

Key features:
- Manage a B-17 crew.
- Take direct control over every squad member.
- Destroy targets.
- Fight enemies.
- Command an entire bomber squad.
